short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spring Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Spring season background. Spring wallpaper background themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spring Wallpaper Extension Features:

1. Each new tab presents a fresh Spring wallpaper.
2. Customize your background by randomizing or favoriting in the wallpaper selection area.
3. Utilize the integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media for quick checking.
5. Displays the current date and time automatically.
6. Create notes to keep track of your tasks.
7. Quick navigation to frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified bookmark access.
9. Shortcut panel addition for streamlined website access.
10. Instant entry to Google applications.
11. Immediate access to additional themes.
12. Share content effortlessly on social platforms.
13. Download wallpapers with just one click.
14. One-click access to online game.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, leaves, or fireworks on your Spring tab.
